verses.verse: And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>: Gather yourselves <S%H622>together<s%>, that I may <S%H5046>tell<s%> you that which shall <S%H7122>befall<s%> you in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.
Assemble <S%H6908>yourselves<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%>, ye <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>; And <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%>.

Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, thou art my <S%H1060>first-born<s%>, my <S%H3581>might<s%>, and the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of my <S%H202>strength<s%>; The <S%H3499>pre-eminence<s%> of <S%H7613>dignity<s%>, and the <S%H3499>pre-eminence<s%> of <S%H5794>power<s%>.

Boiling <S%H6349><s%> over as <S%H4325>water<s%>, thou shalt not have the <S%H3498>pre-eminence<s%>; Because thou wentest <S%H5927>up<s%> to thy <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4904>bed<s%>; Then defiledst <S%H2490>thou<s%> <S%H5927>it<s%>: he went up to my <S%H3326>couch<s%>.
Simeon <S%H8095><s%> and <S%H3878>Levi<s%> are <S%H251>brethren<s%>; <S%H3627>Weapons<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%> are their <S%H4380>swords<s%>.

O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, <S%H935>come<s%> not thou into their <S%H5475>council<s%>; Unto their <S%H6951>assembly<s%>, my <S%H3519>glory<s%>, be not thou <S%H3161>united<s%>; For in their <S%H639>anger<s%> they <S%H2026>slew<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>, And in their <S%H7522>self-will<s%> they <S%H6131>hocked<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be their <S%H639>anger<s%>, for it was <S%H5794>fierce<s%>; And their <S%H5678>wrath<s%>, for it was <S%H7185>cruel<s%>: I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> them in <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, And <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Judah <S%H3063><s%>, thee shall thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%>: Thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be on the <S%H6203>neck<s%> of thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>; Thy <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall bow down before <S%H7812>thee<s%>.

Judah <S%H3063><s%> is a <S%H738>lion<s%>'s <S%H1482>whelp<s%>; From the <S%H2964>prey<s%>, my <S%H1121>son<s%>, thou art gone <S%H5927>up<s%>: He stooped <S%H3766>down<s%>, he <S%H7257>couched<s%> as a <S%H3833>lion<s%>, And as a <S%H3833>lioness<s%>; who shall rouse him <S%H6965>up<s%>?

The <S%H7626>sceptre<s%> shall not <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, Nor the <S%H2710>ruler<s%>'s staff from between his <S%H7272>feet<s%>, <S%H3588>Until<s%> <S%H7886>Shiloh<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>; And unto him shall the <S%H3349>obedience<s%> of the peoples <S%H5971>be<s%>.

Binding <S%H631><s%> his <S%H5895>foal<s%> unto the <S%H1612>vine<s%>, And his <S%H860>ass<s%>'s <S%H1121>colt<s%> unto the choice <S%H8321>vine<s%>; He hath <S%H3526>washed<s%> his <S%H3830>garments<s%> in <S%H3196>wine<s%>, And his <S%H5497>vesture<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes<s%>:
His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall be <S%H2447>red<s%> with <S%H3196>wine<s%>, And his <S%H8127>teeth<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%>.

Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> at the <S%H2348>haven<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; And he shall be for a <S%H2348>haven<s%> of <S%H591>ships<s%>; And his <S%H3411>border<s%> shall be upon <S%H6721>Sidon<s%>.
Issachar <S%H3485><s%> is a <S%H1634>strong<s%> <S%H2543>ass<s%>, Couching <S%H7257>down<s%> between the <S%H4942>sheepfolds<s%>:

And he <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H4496>resting-place<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good<s%>, And the <S%H776>land<s%> that it was <S%H5276>pleasant<s%>; And he <S%H5186>bowed<s%> his <S%H7926>shoulder<s%> to <S%H5445>bear<s%>, And became a <S%H5647>servant<s%> under <S%H4522>taskwork<s%>.
Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, As <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall be a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, An <S%H8207>adder<s%> in the <S%H734>path<s%>, That <S%H5391>biteth<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%>'s <S%H6119>heels<s%>, So that his <S%H7392>rider<s%> <S%H5307>falleth<s%> <S%H268>backward<s%>.
I have waited <S%H6960>for<s%> thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Gad <S%H1410><s%>, a <S%H1416>troop<s%> shall <S%H1464>press<s%> upon <S%H1464>him<s%>; But he shall press upon their <S%H6119>heel<s%>.
Out of <S%H836>Asher<s%> his <S%H3899>bread<s%> shall be <S%H8082>fat<s%>, And he shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> <S%H4428>royal<s%> <S%H4574>dainties<s%>.
Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> is a <S%H355>hind<s%> let <S%H7971>loose<s%>: He <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H8233>goodly<s%> <S%H561>words<s%>.

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> is a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1121>bough<s%>, A <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1121>bough<s%> by a <S%H5869>fountain<s%>; His <S%H1323>branches<s%> <S%H6805>run<s%> over the <S%H7791>wall<s%>.
The <S%H1167>archers<s%> have sorely grieved <S%H4843>him<s%>, And <S%H7232>shot<s%> at <S%H7852>him<s%>, and persecuted him:

But his <S%H7198>bow<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in <S%H386>strength<s%>, And the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> were made <S%H6339>strong<s%>, By the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H46>Mighty<s%> One of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> (From thence is the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>, the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>),

Even by the <S%H410>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, who shall <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H854>thee<s%>, And by the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, who shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H1293>thee<s%>, With blessings of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H5920>above<s%>, <S%H1293>Blessings<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> that <S%H7257>coucheth<s%> <S%H1293>beneath<s%>, Blessings of the <S%H7699>breasts<s%>, and of the <S%H7356>womb<s%>.

The <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%> Have <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> above the <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of my <S%H2029>progenitors<s%> Unto the utmost <S%H8379>bound<s%> of the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1389>hills<s%>: They shall be on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, And on the crown of the <S%H6936>head<s%> of him that was <S%H5139>separate<s%> from his <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> is a <S%H2061>wolf<s%> that <S%H2963>raveneth<s%>: In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> he shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H5706>prey<s%>, And at <S%H6153>even<s%> he shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%>.

All these are the <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and this is it that their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto them and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H834>them<s%>; every <S%H376>one<s%> according to his <S%H1293>blessing<s%> he blessed <S%H1288>them<s%>.

And he <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, and said unto <S%H622>them<s%>, I am to be gathered unto my <S%H5971>people<s%>: <S%H6912>bury<s%> me with my <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>,

in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah<s%>, which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4471>Mamre<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, which <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> with the <S%H7704>field<s%> from <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a <S%H6913>burying-place<s%>.

There they <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>; there they <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>; and there I <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%>â€”
the <S%H7704>field<s%> and the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is <S%H4735>therein<s%>, which was purchased from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%>.

And when <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H6680>charging<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, he gathered <S%H622>up<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%> into the <S%H4296>bed<s%>, and yielded up the <S%H1478>ghost<s%>, and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
